name: Belinar's Sacred Amulet
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The amulet was made for an ancient cleric named Erevan Belinar.
The amulet improves the Smash skill for followers of Belinik.
The amulet's bonus is said to closely tie to the wearer's primary weapon.
